hero_presentation:
Student in the 3rd year Bachelor program in work-study at SupDeVinci (Rennes).
I contribute within CNSI - S&D to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses, as well as a separate application for supplier order management.

subsection1.title: Bac STI2D - SIN Option
subsection1.description: Introduction to the basics of programming with Arduino and ESP32 boards, small Python projects, and an introduction to HTML / CSS.

subsection1.title: BTS SIO - SLAM Option
subsection1.description:
Learning JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Java, C#, HTML, CSS, Symfony, SQL. Development of Symfony projects:
  • Electric Mobility - e-commerce for hoverboards, electric bikes, scooters (everything except the final payment)
  • Ciel Bijou - e-commerce for selling jewelry

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (4 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Creation of 3 pages on an internal business site (accounting) to visualize maximum information about the files.
Technologies: Vue.js / Nuxt / Node.js / Sequelize / PostgreSQL

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (8 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Redesign of the intranet to make it more interactive and modernize the design. Later participation in the ticketing of the internal accounting application Talenz Toaden.
Technologies: Vue.js / Nuxt / Node.js / Sequelize / PostgreSQL

subsection1.title: Bachelor's in Development
subsection1.description:
Work-study studies focused on frontend and backend development, web integration, and company projects.
Ongoing project:
  • Cyna - e-commerce developed in React / Vite / Sequelize / MySQL / Node.js

subsection1.title: Work-Study - CNSI / S&D
subsection1.description:
Contribution to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses and an application for supplier order management.
Technologies: Laravel / MySQL
